metadata.synopsis: Lost goods and piles of valuables - sacks, chests, boxes, backpacks left behind by people dashing out to save their lives.
metadata.how_to_trigger: SCL_Main_A104; 58; -23Talt to S_SCL_RuinedBattleground_LostGoods -  Pile of Sacks

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *A pile of belongings, forsaken to the curse so that their owners could escape with their lives.*
